name: BATTLEBEAKS
description:
Who do those other birds think they are?
Flying over the duck pond, eating your bread...
Better take them out.

BATTLEBEAKS is a 2D duck fighting game.  Choose from 4 player characters and defend your nest from the pesky invaders.

Gather stars to launch starling missiles, and gulp down some black powder ready to lay destructive eggy bombs.

Best played with a gamepad but works with keys.

AVAILABLE NOW :D
